description:
"Keynote: Redesigning the Tech Talent Pipeline" by: Linda Calvin
As tech evolves, we must think differently about sourcing talent. We'll discuss industry statistics, demystifying computer science, what the job description looks like, and 4 year vs. ..?

Recorded at the 2021 Python Web Conference (https://2021.pythonwebconf.com)
title: Keynote: Redesigning the Tech Talent Pipeline
